mapper.insert: insert into CRM_ORDER_BUSINESS_REL (EVENT_ID, ORDER_ID, BUSINESS_ID, COMPANY_ID, OWNER_ID, NEED_THIRD_PARTY, THIRD_PARTY_ID, THIRD_PARTY_FEE, BUSINESS_TAG, PRE_EVENT_ID, REMARK) values (#{eventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{needThirdParty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thirdPartyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thirdPartyFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{businessTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preEventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update CRM_ORDER_BUSINESS_REL set ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESS_ID = #{businessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNER_ID = #{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEED_THIRD_PARTY = #{needThirdParty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, THIRD_PARTY_ID = #{thirdPartyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, THIRD_PARTY_FEE = #{thirdPartyFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BUSINESS_TAG = #{businessTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRE_EVENT_ID = #{preEventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where EVENT_ID = #{eventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select EVENT_ID, ORDER_ID, BUSINESS_ID, COMPANY_ID, OWNER_ID, NEED_THIRD_PARTY, THIRD_PARTY_ID, THIRD_PARTY_FEE, BUSINESS_TAG, PRE_EVENT_ID, REMARK from CRM_ORDER_BUSINESS_REL where EVENT_ID = #{eventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
